QuestData.Title: Follow the Path
QuestData.Description:
Maldraxxus must answer for their crimes against Bastion. There shall be justice!
Let us go to Oribos and speak with the Tal-Inara, the Honored Voice. We will tell her what has transpired this day. Tell her that the kyrian will not stand idle against this aggression.
Artemede will inform the Archon. My brothers and sisters will surely prepare for war.
That must not come to pass.
QuestData.LogDescription: Inform Tal-Inara in Oribos of Maldraxxus's attack on Bastion.
QuestData.RewardText: I know why you have come. This kyrian has explained much.
